short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate how much you've spent in Shopee

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension will use the class name at HTML side. So it will not involve any API calls. Please contact me if Shopee side change their class name again for me to update my code.
